DOC.brief_title: Study of Preventive Treatment With Symbicort or Budicort Turbohaler in Childhood Asthma Return to School Epidemic
DOC.detailed_description: During the second week of September( week 38 of the year)there are recorded data of exacerbation of asthma all over the world, including Israel. A short preventive treatment of 6 weeks may reduce asthma exacerbation in children,reduce primary care and ER visiting and hospitalization. We will study the effectiveness of Budicort or Symbicort turbuhaler as a preventive treatment in children aged 6-18 years.
DOC.criteria: age : 618 years suffering from asthma asthma exacerbation during 1/9/200915/10/2009 any chronic condition that can involve respiratory tract (other than asthma) treated as prevention with ICS or montelukast from July 2010 Treated with oral steroids during the August 2010 asthma exacerbation one week prior study inclusion
